entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:02 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 40 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 40 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 56 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 9:02 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 9:02 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023
